issue.title: [Format] Update IPC.md to account for dictionary batches
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-986](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-986). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The document incorrectly states that dictionary encoding has not been implemented
